articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: The Backbone Pro controller makes mobile gaming worth the hassle - TechCrunch
articles.description: The Backbone Pro controller is now on sale, bringing iOS and Android gaming experiences to a more impressive level.
articles.content:
The mobile controller company Backbone unveiled its Backbone Pro controller this week, which brings iOS and Android gaming experiences to the next level.
A successor to the Backbone One controller, … [+3759 chars]
